translations.chinese: 能出捐此地以許兩人，使各自為戰，則楚易敗也。」
translations.english: If you can give up this land to satisfy these two men, letting each fight for himself, then Chu will be easy to defeat."

translations.chinese: 於是漢王發使使韓信、彭越。
translations.english: So King Han sent envoys to Han Xin and Peng Yue.
They arrived and both led troops to come.

translations.chinese: 十一月，劉賈入楚地，圍壽春。
translations.english: In the eleventh month, Liu Jia entered Chu territory and surrounded Shouchun.

translations.chinese: 漢亦遣人誘楚大司馬周殷。
translations.english: Han also sent people to entice Chu grand marshal Zhou Yin.
